content:
That's a great idea! Alex sounds like a fantastic addition to the group. Since he's a close friend and has already shown his hospitality by hosting the housewarming party, I'm sure he'll fit right in with the gang.

With Alex joining the mix, you'll have a diverse and fun-loving group of friends. Rachel, Jack, Mike, Sarah, and Alex will likely create a lively and engaging atmosphere, perfect for a game night.

Remember to keep the group size manageable, though. With six people, you'll want to ensure everyone has a chance to participate and interact with each other. You might consider setting up multiple gaming stations or having a few different games going on simultaneously to accommodate everyone's interests.

Since Alex is already familiar with your new place, he can also help facilitate the evening and make sure everyone is having a good time. Plus, he might even bring some new game ideas or suggestions to the table!

Overall, I think inviting Alex is an excellent decision. He'll undoubtedly bring his signature energy and enthusiasm to the game night, making it an unforgettable evening for everyone involved.
